author: Mike Monroe
title: Spurs-Pistons live Q&A with Mike Monroe
text:

The Kings won 95-92. The Kings won 95-92.(AP Photo/Rich Pedroncelli) San Antonio Spurs forward Danny Green, right, drives against Sacramento Kings forward Marco Belinelli, of Italy, during the second half of an NBA preseason basketball game in Sacramento, Calif., Thursday ... more Photo: Rich Pedroncelli, STF / Associated Press Image 8 of 26 So far this presesaon, Danny Green hasn’t been “shoot the ball, Danny,” the long-range weapon in Gregg Popovich‘s offense. So far this presesaon, Danny Green hasn’t been “shoot the ball, Danny,” the long-range weapon in Gregg Popovich‘s offense. Photo: John Bazemore /Associated Press Image 9 of 26 FILE - In this April 5, 2015, file photo, San Antonio Spurs guard Danny Green shoots during the first half of an NBA basketball game against the Golden State Warriors in San Antonio. Danny Green isn't going anywhere. A person with knowledge of the situation tells The Associated Press that Green has agreed to terms with the San Antonio Spurs on a four-year contract worth $45 million. The person spoke on condition of anonymity because the deal has not been officially announced. Per league rules, it cannot be signed until July 9. (AP Photo/Darren Abate, File) FILE - In this April 5, 2015, file photo, San Antonio Spurs guard Danny Green shoots during the first half of an NBA basketball game against the Golden State Warriors in San Antonio. Danny Green isn't going ... more Photo: Darren Abate, FRE / Associated Press Image 10 of 26 Manu Ginobili and Patty Mills showcase the Spurs' new alternative jerseys for the 2015-16 season. The jerseys feature the over-sized Spurs logo with an all-black finish. Manu Ginobili and Patty Mills showcase the Spurs' new alternative jerseys for the 2015-16 season. (AP Photo/John Bazemore) Atlanta Hawks center Walter Tavares (22 and San Antonio Spurs guard Danny Green (14) battle for control of the ball in the first first half of an NBA preseason basketball game Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015, in ... more Photo: John Bazemore, Associated Press Image 25 of 26 San Antonio Spurs guard Manu Ginobili (20) goes up for a basket against Atlanta Hawks forward Al Horford (15) in the first first half of an NBA preseason basketball game Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015, in Atlanta. (AP Photo/John Bazemore) San Antonio Spurs guard Manu Ginobili (20) goes up for a basket against Atlanta Hawks forward Al Horford (15) in the first first half of an NBA preseason basketball game Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015, in Atlanta. ... more Photo: John Bazemore, Associated Press Image 26 of 26 Spurs-Pistons live Q&A with Mike Monroe 1 / 26 Back to Gallery Join Express-News Spurs beat writer Mike Monroe Sunday at noon as the five-time NBA champions prepare for their first home game of the preseason against the Detroit Pistons.
Starting at 6 a.m. CT Sunday, you can leave questions for Mike by commenting below, or by tweeting directly at him, @Monroe_SA .
The Q&A will stay posted even after the chat concludes, so you can read back through all of Mike's interactions and answers.
RELATED: Point Game Podcast: Talking Spurs, NBA with Steve Smith
Throughout the season, one of the Express-News' handful of Spurs beat reporters – Jeff McDonald, Dan McCarney, Mike Monroe, Tom Orsborn and Jabari Young — will be on hand to answer any and all Spurs-related questions you may have.
Along with the chats, follow our reporters on Twitter, read them daily in the Express-News and at MySA.com and Express-News.com and subscribe to the new weekly Spurs Nation magazine.
mmonroe@express-news.net
Twitter: @Monroe_SA
